Method Detail

cardListNameFilter

public CardList cardListNameFilter(Iterable<Card> toBeFiltered,
                                   String substring)
Filter a sequence (iterable) of cards to a list of equal or smaller size whose names contain the given substring. We perform the substring search without sensitivity to case.

Parameters:
toBeFiltered - an Iterable of Card instances
substring - a String object.
Returns:
a CardList object.

public static com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> getRarity(com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> inputGenerator,
                                                               String rarity)

filter

public static CardList filter(Iterable<Card> iterable,
                              CardListFilter filt)
Filter an iterable sequence of Cards; note this is a static method that is very similar to the non-static one.

Parameters:
iterable - the sequence of cards to examine
filt - determines which cards are present in the resulting list
Returns:
a list of Cards that meet the filtering criteria; may be empty, but never null

getColor

public static com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> getColor(com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> inputGenerator,
                                                              String cardColor)
Filter a Generator of Cards based on their colors; this does not cause the generator to be evaluated, but rather defers the filtering to when the result's generate method is called (e.g., by YieldUtils.toIterable).

Parameters:
inputGenerator - the sequence to filter
cardColor - a String object; "Multicolor" is also accepted.
Returns:
a new Generator with the filter in place

getSets

public static com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> getSets(com.google.code.jyield.Generator<Card> inputGenerator,
                                                             ArrayList<String> sets)

Get any cards that exist in the passed in sets list.

Parameters:
sets - a ArrayList object.
Returns:
a CardList object.
